p: (3) 5-Lipoxygenase Inhibitory Assay. The evaluation of the activity of 5-lipoxygenase was used to study the effect of the compounds on the production of leukotrienes. It appears from this table that Combretin A and B, as well as diclofenac sodium, have a significant effect ( p < 0.001) on 5-lipoxygenase activity with an inhibition of 76.68%, 91.21%, and 95.31%, respectively ( Table 1).
